## One-on-One Meeting Checklist
Strengthen relationships and provide support.

- [ ] Review agenda items  
- [ ] Discuss progress and challenges  
- [ ] Provide feedback  
- [ ] Explore growth opportunities  
- [ ] Agree on next steps
